title: Recognition Science: A Lean 4, Certificates‑First Verification Instrument
description: Lean 4 verification instrument exposing a certificates‑first, reproducible proof spine for a parameter‑free physics framework (UltimateClosure, PrimeClosure, exclusivity/bi‑interpretability, φ‑only α evaluator). Includes machine‑readable audit and non‑interactive comparator as the hard CI gate.
notes: This deposit archives the v1.0.0 release. See README.md and paper.md for installation, usage, and testability.
